question: According to the later Vedic Era beliefs, which of the following Gods were elected democratically?
explanation: In the Later Vedic period, Prajapati was the important diety occupied the supreme position. Prajapatis were elected democratically. First such elected Prajapati was Lord Vishnu, followed by Lord Br√†hma and Lord Shankar. There were total 26 Prajapatis mentioned in Vedas.
